data.scheme_name: West Bengal Bhabishyat Credit Card Scheme (WBBCCS)-Existing
data.benefits: The scheme offers a Margin Money contribution of 10% of the project cost, subject to a maximum limit of Rs. 0.25 lakh.
data.eligibility:
All individuals who are Indian National and residing in West Bengal for past 10 years wants to open unit the state are eligible under this scheme.
Age : 18-55 Years
data.conditions:
Only one person per family (self and spouse) is eligible. Project cost must be Up to Rs. 5 Lakh. 

Applications not sanctioned under Karmasathi Prakalpa before 1st April 2023 will migrate to this scheme. 

Not applicable to Central/State Govt employees and their families. 

Not applicable to defaulter borrowers in banks/financial institutions. Bank loan will be 100% covered jointly by CGTMSE & Govt of West Bengal.
data.beneficiaries:
All individuals who are Indian National and residing in West Bengal for past 10 years wants to open unit the state are eligible under this scheme.
Age : 18-55 Years
data.prerequisites:
Only one person per family (self and spouse) is eligible.
Project cost must be Up to Rs. 5 Lakh.
Applications not sanctioned under Karmasathi Prakalpa before 1st April 2023 will migrate to this scheme.
Not applicable to Central/State Govt employees and their families.
Not applicable to defaulter borrowers in banks/financial institutions.
Bank loan will be 100% covered jointly by CGTMSE & Govt of West Bengal.
data.nodal_agency: Department of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises and Textiles
data.context: Governor is of the opinion that it is necessary to introduce an innovative scheme to provide self-employment to the young entrepreneurs of West Bengal for promotion and development of MSMEs in the State
data.objective: The aim is to empower them to be self-reliant by setting up micro enterprises.
data.description:
Scheme provides margin money subsidy as given below:
Government Subsidy: 10% of Project Cost, max Rs.0.25 lakhs.
Bank Loan: Approved Project Cost minus Govt Subsidy, subsidized interest rate of 4% per annum to the borrower.
Guarantee Coverage: 100% of Bank loan covered jointly by CGTMSE & Govt of WB.
Note: 
CGTMSE Guarantee Coverage: 85% by CGTMSE, 15% by State Govt, Total 100%
Annual Guarantee Fee (AGF): Charged by CGTMSE on its share; no additional fee for State Govt coverage
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link: https://bccs.wb.gov.in/account/login/
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives after the approval from the concerned authority.
data.additional_info: Eligible Lending Institutions (L.I.) : All Scheduled Public Sector Banks, Private Sector banks, Regional Rural Banks, Small Finance Banks, Cooperative Banks and any other Lending Institution as may be prescribed.
data.checklist_info_a:
Aadhar Card
Proof of Photo Identity of the applicant
Proof of Residence
Proof of Age
Detailed Project Report
Pan Card
Trade Reg. certificate / Certificate of Enlistment (Trade License)
UDYAM Registration certificate
